title: Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve
summary: Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve (NYRE) is an annual New Year's Eve television special broadcast by ABC. The special broadcasts primarily from New York City's Times Square and prominently features coverage of its annual ball drop event, along with live and pre-recorded musical performances by popular musicians from Times Square and Hollywood. Since 2016â€“17, the special has regularly included performances and coverage of midnight festivities from New Orleans in the Central Time Zone as well.
